title: Bad Guy
overview: Ji Woon goes to a caf√© after receiving a call from his ex-boyfriend Tae Ha. Ji Woon, who is waiting for his ex with excitement, wondering if anything will happen, hears from Tae Ha that he is getting married to So Hee. Ji Woon is shocked and disappointed, but Tae Ha smiles regardless. Ji Woon then feels a burning desire for revenge on Tae Ha.
